name: Legaseed
description:
Controls:

  • Move card around with left mouse button
  • Open card details with right mouse button
  • Move camera around with WASD or click-drag middle mouse button

Objective:

Grow the Evertree as much as you can and don't let it burn

How to play:

Move cards around and stack them on each other! 
Right click on cards to learn more about them. Some interactions are also only available through the right-click panel.
Try to gather resources to grow the Evertree and fend off bandit attacks.

Theme interpretation:

A game submission for PPJJGG

"Permanence"

Even though life is impermanent, while we are alive, we can make changes that lead to permanent improvements to society that can be felt generations after. Our life is temporary but our legacy will last forever.

The more the Evertree grows, the more it provides. Each Everspirit works diligently to help the Evertree grow so that their descendants can have a better life.

The team:

Artist: @adibg_art
Game Design/Programmer:  Varz
Composer/sound designer: Kiri
Writer: Ollnozz

Notes:

Like all game jam projects, this was rushed out in 7 days and many things in the original scope were not able to make it into the submission. 

As a result, the game as it is probably seems a little empty, aimless and very confusing. But we hope that it'll give you a rough glimpse of the game's potential and that you'll look forward to our future updates.
